title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
OB: After clicking on a link in the welcome page, the action is executed, but the clicked link is not visually selected when returning to the welcome page.
EB: Upon clicking on a link in the welcome page, the clicked link should be visually selected when the user returns to the welcome page, providing clearer context.
SR: 1. Ensure you are using build 20021001. 2. Confirm that you have a welcome page displayed upon restarting (by removing the welcome line in prefstore.ini of the workbench metadata). 3. Click on any link in the welcome page. 4. Observe that the appropriate action is executed. 5. Return to the welcome page. 6. Notice that the clicked link is not visually selected. 7. Suggest modifying the behavior so that links are selected when clicked to enhance user understanding upon returning to the welcome page.
